creditline: Gift of Loren G. Lipson, M.D.
description: modified Greek key pattern at a diagonal in white on a painted black ground; thin white band around rim with wider black band nearest lip; wide shoulder with small foot and mouth; pattern is largest in center and decreases near rim and foot
